bannerDescription: The “Houkouki fi al 3amal” app, which translates to “my rights at work”, provides information and training for workers, employers and wider society on rights and responsibilities at work. The app features a Q&A section on key aspects of the Lebanese labour law, a downloadable user-friendly guide, and self-paced training modules.
title: Start unit
example: The huqouqi fil 3amal course is organized into 3 units. As you complete a unit, the next unit will unlock. Each unit includes learning objectives, topics, Q&A and self practice resources.
assessmentsDescription: Complete each topic in unit to progress. Each topic includes a pre-assessment, a training video, exercises, and a final assessment of your learning to advance.
certifiedDescription: Once you complete all topics within the three units with an assessment of 70% or higher, you will complete the course and unlock your huqouqi fil 3amal certificate!
